title.rendered: #84 Are you making this Basic Mistake in your Amazon business?

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 5:29 — 5.0MB)

#84 Basic Mistake…but easily made

I’m not going to give away this basic mistake – but let’s say, the sea gives you a major clue…and have  a listen to this 5-minute episode…

Part of the **Summer Series** of bite-sized chunks of Amazon Strategic Goodness!

Watch What you should never do on Amazon as a seller
